name: Greek Pork & Couscous Wraps

ingredients.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix or Greek Dressing Mix
Herbed Garlic Sea Salt Blend or sea salt
Greek Roasted Pork Chops
ingredients.additionalInstruction: cooked and cut into bite-sized pieces

preparation: In a mixing bowl, using Piano Wire Whisk, whisk Tzatziki ingredients. Store in fridge.

In a heat-safe bowl, stir couscous with boiling water. Cover and let couscous absorb water, approximately 5 min. Fluff with a fork, and check couscous is cooked to taste. If needed, add another 1⁄2 cup boiling water, and allow to absorb. Season with oil and sea salt.
In a heat-safe dish, reheat pork for approximately 10 minutes in a 350Â° F oven, or microwave on medium for 5 min.
To assemble, divide and top each pita with couscous, pork, tomatoes, cucumber, and Tzatziki. Roll up or serve open-faced.
tips: If pitas are full to bursting, you may need a knife and fork!
Gluten-free tip: Swap out couscous for quinoa and gluten-free corn tortillas for pitas.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate.
